scripts.build:repositories: esbuild ./do-not-refactor/LawnmowerRepository.js --outfile=./compiled/LawnmowerRepository.js --bundle --format=esm --footer:js="export default LawnmowerRepository;" && esbuild ./do-not-refactor/PhoneCaseRepository.js --outfile=./compiled/PhoneCaseRepository.js --bundle --format=esm --footer:js="export default PhoneCaseRepository;" && esbuild ./do-not-refactor/TShirtRepository.js --outfile=./compiled/TShirtRepository.js --bundle --format=esm --footer:js="export default TShirtRepository;"
